attributes.action: force the BBC to bring back the "999" program with Michael Burke as presenter.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This program should never have finished and resultantly the powers that be, should force the BBC (by any means possible) to bring this ever popular program back the dead and onto the nations television screens. For the educational benefit and cultural pleasures that can be derived from Mr Burke.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
